## Welcome to my website!

This is an individual project of BDS 522 course, rooted in the Mater of Behavioral and Decision Sciences program from University of Pennsylvania.

This project is about the influential factors on the number of immigrants from different states of the US.

Please check the column at the top of this page and click the corresponding tag for details!
